testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser in login page..............................passed When User opens URL 'https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login'..............passed And User enters email as 'admin@yourstore.com' and Password as 'admin'......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then first page title should be 'dashboard / nopCommerce administration'....passed When User click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be 'your store. Login'...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
